entry.title: Libbitcoin for Core people
entry.summary: The recent observation has highlighted an issue with Core shutdown times, which were extending to 10 minutes or more. This problem has been addressed and resolved through a specific fix. The resolution can be found in the form of a pull request on GitHub, available at [https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30611](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30611). This fix is crucial for improving the efficiency and reliability of the Core's operation by significantly reducing its shutdown duration.
